last_episode_to_air.name: Hitozuma Cosplay Kissa 2: Hitozuma LoveLove
last_episode_to_air.overview: There is a "Sakurai" coffee shop in the small spending center owned by a beautiful widow, Sakurako. The number of customers has increased because a new amusement park "Ocean Land" was built here. One day the owner of "Ocean Land" plans to rebuild this into a major expenditure center. Only Sakurako agreed to the plan to discuss his coffee shop because it was full of good memories with approval. The requirement to cancel this plan is to collect many customers from the "Sakurai" coffee shop. That way they renew their costumes with cosplay at the coffee shop to attract many customers.

name: Hitozuma Cosplay Kissa 2: Hitozuma LoveLove

The number of customers has increased because a new amusement park "Ocean Land" was built here. One day the owner of "Ocean Land" plans to rebuild this into a major expenditure center. Only Sakurako agreed to the plan to discuss his coffee shop because it was full of good memories with approval. The requirement to cancel this plan is to collect many customers from the "Sakurai" coffee shop. That way they renew their costumes with cosplay at the coffee shop to attract many customers.
